mng: to substitute, to act on behalf of others, to replace, generation, dynasty, age, period, (historical) era, (geological) eon

exm.mng: representative, delegate, to represent, to stand for, on behalf of, in the name of
a decade of a century (e.g. the Sixties), age, era, period
age, era, epoch, period (in one's life)
modern times, modern age, modern era
to act on behalf of sb in a responsible position, to act as an agent or proxy, surrogate
secondary, twice in the year (of generations of insects, harvests etc)
for many generations, generation, era, age
